attributes.action: Give more support to children in care and to care leavers. They don't disappear
attributes.background:
There are so many cases of children disappearing from care homes nationwide and the local authority just simply saying 'the system failed' 'we lost track of them'
We need to force the government pay attention to this issue because children do not simply fall off the face of the earth.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to support children in care and care leavers.
